news.title: Iona Zajac: "The song is taken from a series of absurd dreams in which I ended up visiting Billy Connolly's house"
news.summary: Iona Zajac’s brilliant debut album, Bang, is the pinnacle of a mega year, in which the Scottish polymath toured with The Pogues and supported Alison Moyet.

news.title: Album Review: Seán O'Meara, Notions, Potions & Emotions
news.summary: Cohesive and gripping debut from consummate folk-pop craftsman. 8/10

news.title: Bob Vylan issue defamation proceedings against RTÉ over Glastonbury chant reporting
news.summary: "Our clients are no strangers to utilising their freedom of expression to speak out against the genocide in Gaza," said Phoenix Law solicitor Darragh Mackin.

news.title: Jazzy releases new single ‘Can’t Deny It’ with Spriitzz
Swimmer Max McCusker joins the controversial Enhanced Games
news.summary: The first Enhanced Games is set for May 2026 in Las Vegas.

news.title: Rosie Carney announces new album
news.summary: The new release is out February 27, 2026.

news.title: Huartan voice support for Palestine solidarity activists on hunger strike in UK prison
news.summary: "Echoes of the 1981 hunter strikes are ringing loud in our ears," Huartan said.

news.title: Daithí to score new Channel 4 series Hunting Alice Bell
news.summary: The series is set to release next year.
